content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Telok Blangah Single Member Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(May 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Telok Blangah Single Member Constituency** was a [single member constituency](/wiki/Single-member_district) (SMC) in Singapore. The constituency was formed in 1959 and was abolished in 1991. ## History In 1959, the **Telok Blangah Constituency** was formed. The Constituency saw [Joshua Benjamin Jeyaretnam](/wiki/Joshua_Benjamin_Jeyaretnam) contesting twice with increasing wins and nearly winning in the 1980 Singapore Election with 47% of the votes before he won in Anson in 1981. In 1988, it was renamed as **Telok Blangah Single Member Constituency** as part of Singapore's political reforms. In 1991, it was abolished and merged into [West Coast Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/West_Coast_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1959**John Mammen[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**[Bernard Rodrigues](/wiki/Bernard_Rodrigues)[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1968**N. Naidu Govindasamy[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1972****1976**Shaik Ahmad bin Abdul Haleem**1979**Rohan bin Kamis**1980****1984**Koh Lam Son**1988** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election): Telok Blangah PartyCandidateVotes%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)John Mammen5,80350.4[PKMS](/wiki/Pertubuhan_Kebangsaan_Melayu_Singapura)Osman Gani4,14136.0[Citizens' Party](/wiki/Citizens%27_Party_(Singapore))Wee Kim Hock1,23010.7[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politician))V.
